title: Didn't get my free lootbox
body: I have two free hextech boxes I can earn,I attain a S- in one of my matches but didn't get the box? Help please

replies.body: Looks like you've already gotten a chest for all the champions you've been playing. Keep in mind you can only get one of those hextech mastery chests per champ per season.
be sure that you  can earn 1 chest for  each champ in a season.
